name: Marble Vita Free - Play With Peg Solitaire
name_original: Marble Vita Free - Play With Peg Solitaire
description:
Click to select or drag one marble to jump over another one to an empty hole the goal of this classic Marble Vita strategy game is to remove as many marbles as possible, by jump one marble over another, either horizontally or vertically. The marble will be removed. If you can remove all Marble except one, 50 levels above games available.

Marble Vita rule is quite easy and there are a lot of variation.Up to 50 above puzzles based on classic style are included, from very easy to quite play with difficult level. You can solve it one by one,

Features:
- Professional graphics
- Smooth game play and moments
- Ability to reset/restart game

Any suggestions or feedback are welcome!
GoodLuck!
